PageTitle: lsp-tp outbound (MPLS TE P2MP template view)
FuncDef:
The lsp-tp outbound command enables traffic policing for automatic P2MP TE tunnels.
The undo lsp-tp command disables traffic policing for automatic P2MP TE tunnels.
By default, traffic policing is disabled for automatic P2MP TE tunnels.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Physical links over which a P2MP TE tunnel is established transmit traffic of other TE tunnels, traffic of non-CR LSP traffic, or even IP traffic, in addition to TE tunnel traffic. To limit TE traffic within a configured bandwidth range, run the lsp-tp outbound command.
Prerequisites
A P2MP tunnel template has been configured using the mpls te p2mp-template command.
Configuration Impact
After the mpls te lsp-tp outbound command is run, TE traffic is limited within a configured bandwidth range. TE traffic out of the range is discarded.
